</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	) were acquired as a result of the Merger. These vessels were built in Korea and China between 2009 and 2013 and were sold en-bloc for an aggregate price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$272.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$34.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per vessel on average. The vessels were delivered to Ship Finance in the third quarter of 2015 and were time chartered-in by one of our subsidiaries for a period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;years. The daily time charter rate is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$17,600
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;during the first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	seven
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;years and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$14,900
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in the remaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;years, of which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$7,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;is for operating expenses (including dry docking costs). In addition,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	33%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of our profit from revenues above the daily time charter rate for all

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels aggregated will be calculated and paid on a quarterly basis to Ship Finance and the daily hire payments will be adjusted if the actual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	three
</FONT>

	&#32;month LIBOR should deviate from a base LIBOR of

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0.4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per annum. For each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0.1%

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;point increase/decrease in the interest rate level, the daily charter hire will increase or decrease by

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	seven
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$25
</FONT>

	&#32;per day in the remaining

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	three

	ten

	&#32;years and, if such option is not exercised, Ship Finance will have the option to extend the charters by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$14,900
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per day. We incurred
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$12.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of charter hire expenses in 2015 (2014:

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	) in respect of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to Ship Finance related to these vessels since April 1, 2015.

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We are the commercial manager for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	eleven
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;container vessel owned and operated by Ship Finance. Pursuant to the management agreements, we receive

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;a day for managing the container vessels.

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Seatankers
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Management Agreements
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	General Management Agreement
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-36
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Up to March 31, 2015, we were provided with general administrative services by the General Manager. Pursuant to the terms of the Amended General Management Agreement, the General Manager was entitled to a management fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per annum from January 1, 2010, which was subject to annual adjustments, plus a commission of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;on gross freight revenues from our vessels,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of proceeds on the sale of any of our vessels, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of the cost of the purchase of our vessels. In addition, we, in our discretion, awarded equity incentives to the General Manager based upon its performance. Such awards were subject to the approval of the Board. We were responsible for paying all out-of-pocket expenses incurred by the General Manager from third parties in connection with the services provided under the Amended General Management Agreement, such as audit, legal and other professional fees, registration fees and directors' and officers' fees and expenses. The Amended General Management Agreement was terminated on March 31, 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Technical Management
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We receive technical management services from the General Manager. Pursuant to the terms of the agreement, Frontline received a management fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$33,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per vessel in 2015. This fee is subject to annual review. Frontline also manages our newbuilding supervision and charges us for the costs incurred in relation to the supervision.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Ship Management
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The ship management of our vessels is provided by ship managers subcontracted by the General Manager. Technical management for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourteen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels (2014:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels) is provided by SeaTeam Management Pte. Ltd, a majority owned subsidiary of Frontline.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Other Management Services
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We aim to operate efficiently through utilizing competence from Frontline or other companies with the same main shareholder and these costs are allocated based on a cost plus mark-up model. Specifically, we receive assistance in relation to consolidation and reporting as well as management of its Sarbanes Oxley compliance from Frontline. We currently pay a fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$115,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per quarter for this service.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	A summary of net amounts charged by related parties in 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;is as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Receivables and payables with related parties mainly comprise unpaid commercial management fees, newbuilding supervision fees and the amount owed by Frontline in connection with the sale of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Suezmax newbuilding contracts in December 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In addition certain payables and receivables arise when we pay an invoice on behalf of a related party and vice versa.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We periodically issue RSUs to the board of directors and management companies.&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="GOGL-201520F_HTM_SCCEE6C84B4DE8B9C4F73F3AA3F71EFA1">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	30. FINANCIAL ASSETS AND LIABILITIES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Interest rate risk management
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During 2015, we assumed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;interest rate swaps as a result of the Merger and have subsequently entered into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;interest rate swaps. These swaps are intended to reduce the risk associated with fluctuations in interest rates whereby the floating interest rate on an original principal amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$400 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of the then anticipated debt was switched to fixed rate. During 2014, we were not party to any interest rate swaps transactions. Credit risk exists to the extent that the counter parties are unable to perform under the contracts but this risk is considered remote as the counter parties are banks, which participate in loan facilities to which the interest rate swaps are related.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our interest rate swap transactions as at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which are not designated as hedging instruments are summarized as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_88"></A>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	(in thousands of $)
</FONT>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Notional Amount

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

	Inception Date

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Changes in the fair value of the interest rate swap transactions are recorded in "Loss on derivatives" in the consolidated statement of operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-38
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage133"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forward freight agreements
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We take positions from time to time in the freight forward market, either as a hedge to a physical contract or as a speculative position. The counterparties to such contracts are major banking and financial institutions. Credit risk exists to the extent that the counter parties are unable to perform under the contracts but this risk is considered remote as the counter parties are well established banks.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During 2015, we assumed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;contract as a result of the Merger. During 2014, we did not have any such contracts. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, we had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	nd
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	contracts outstanding, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The losses on freight forward agreements are recorded in "Loss on derivatives" in the consolidated statement of operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Bunker derivatives
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We enter into cargo contracts from time to time. We are then exposed to fluctuations in bunker prices, as the cargo contract price is based on an assumed bunker price for the trade. There is no guarantee that the hedge removes all the risk from the bunker exposure, due to possible differences in location and timing of the bunkering between the physical and financial position. The counterparties to such contracts are major banking and financial institutions. Credit risk exists to the extent that the counter parties are unable to perform under the contracts but this risk is considered remote as the counter parties are well established banks.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We assumed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;contracts as a result of the Merger, of which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;matured during 2015 and have subsequently entered into another
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;contracts. During 2014, we did not have any such contracts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, we had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;contracts outstanding, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Losses on bunker derivatives are recorded in "Loss on derivatives" in the consolidated statement of operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Foreign currency risk
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The majority of our transactions, assets and liabilities are denominated in United States dollars, our functional currency. However, we incur expenditure in currencies other than the functional currency, mainly in Norwegian Kroner and Singapore Dollars. There is a risk that currency fluctuations in transactions incurred in currencies other than the functional currency will have a negative effect of the value of our cash flows. We are then exposed to currency fluctuations and enters into foreign currency swaps to mitigate such risk exposures. The counterparties to such contracts are major banking and financial institutions. Credit risk exists to the extent that the counter parties are unable to perform under the contracts but this risk is considered remote as the counter parties are well established banks.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During 2015, we entered into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	thirty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;foreign currency swaps. During 2014, we did not have any such contracts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, we had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	twenty-four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;contracts outstanding, respectively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Changes in the fair value of foreign currency swaps are recorded in "Loss on derivatives" in the consolidated statement of operations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fair values
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The carrying value and estimated fair value of our financial instruments at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;are as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>

	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000;">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	There have been no transfers between different levels in the fair value hierarchy in 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following methods and assumptions were used to estimate the fair value of each class of financial instrument:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The carrying value of cash and cash equivalents, which are highly liquid, approximate fair value.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Restricted cash and investments &#8211; the balances relate entirely to restricted cash and the carrying values in the balance sheet approximate their fair value.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Floating rate debt - the carrying value in the balance sheet approximates the fair value since it bears a variable interest rate, which is reset on a quarterly basis.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Convertible bond &#8211; quoted market prices are not available, however the bonds are traded "over the counter" and the fair value of bonds is based on the market price on offer at the year end.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sellers credit - the fair value was determined by discounting the expected future cash outflow of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$4.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which is payable upon maturity in 2016, by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Assets Measured at Fair Value on a Nonrecurring Basis
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	See Note 4 for a summary of the estimated fair values of the assets acquired and liabilities assumed as a result of the Merger.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At December 31, 2015 the investment in Golden Opus Inc was measured at fair value, the fair value was based level three inputs, the expected market values of the underlying assets and liabilities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At December 31, 2015 the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Lyderhorn,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a vessel held under capital lease was measured at fair value, the fair value was based level three inputs, was determined using discounted expected future cash flows for the vessel.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the newbuildings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Front Caribbean
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Front Mediterranean
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;newbuildings were measured at fair value of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$17.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	). This was determined using level three inputs being the expected cash flows from the sale of the completed vessels at September 2015 of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$7.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, plus subsequent expenditure on the newbuildings.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Assets Measured at Fair Value on a Recurring Basis
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-40
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage135"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Marketable securities are listed equity securities considered to be available-for-sale securities for which the fair value as at the balance sheet date is their aggregate market value based on quoted market prices (level 1) for the investment in a company listed on a U.S. stock exchange and level two for the investment in the company listed on the Norwegian 'over the counter' market.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The fair value (level 2) of interest rate, currency swap and bunker swap agreements is the present value of the estimated future cash flows that we would receive or pay to terminate the agreements at the balance sheet date, taking into account, as applicable, fixed interest rates on interest rate swaps, current interest rates, forward rate curves, current and future bunker prices and the credit worthiness of both us and the derivative counterparty.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Concentrations of risk
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	There is a concentration of credit risk with respect to cash and cash equivalents to the extent that substantially all of the amounts are carried with Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken, DnB and Nordea Bank Norge ASA. However, we believe this risk is remote, as these financial institutions are established and reputable establishments with no prior history of default. We do not require collateral or other security to support financial instruments subject to credit risk.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="GOGL-201520F_HTM_SF955A78D6978EE281784F3AA3F49E0D6">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	31. COMMITMENTS AND CONTINGENCIES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The General Manager insures the legal liability risks for our shipping activities with Assuranceforeningen SKULD and Assuranceforeningen Gard Gjensidig, both mutual protection and indemnity associations. We are subject to calls payable to the associations based on our claims record in addition to the claims records of all other members of the associations. A contingent liability exists to the extent that the claims records of the members of the associations in the aggregate show significant deterioration, which result in additional calls on the members.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessel held under capital lease, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Lyderhorn,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;that was sold by the Former Golden Ocean in 2006 and leased back for a period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ten years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. At the time of the sale a sellers credit for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.7 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was given to lessor and becomes payable on redelivery and sale of the vessel. We have the right to purchase the vessel for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$14.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;less the sellers credit in August 2016, if this is not exercised the lessor has the option to put the vessel on us at the end of the lease terms for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$12.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;less the sellers credit. The total amount that we would be required to pay in 2016 under this put options is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$9.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(2014:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the joint venture that owns the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Opus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;had total bank debt outstanding of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$18.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and we had guaranteed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of this amount. Consequently, our maximum potential liability was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$9.15 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;as of this date. We have not recorded any liability in respect of this arrangement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We sold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels to Ship Finance in the third quarter of 2015 and leased them back on charters for an initial period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ten years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. We have a purchase option of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$112 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;en-bloc after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ten years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and, if such option is not exercised, Ship Finance will have the option to extend the charters by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3 years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$14,900
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per day.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, we had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eighteen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels under construction, of which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;have been sold and will be delivered to the new owners on delivery from the yard in 2016. We will receive net sales proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$46.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per vessel at time of delivery. Our outstanding commitments for our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eighteen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;remaining newbuildings amount to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$570.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;with expected payments of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$502.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in 2016 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$67.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in 2017 for expected delivery of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sixteen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels in 2016 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;vessels in 2017.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We have claims for unpaid charter hire owed by Titan Petrochemicals Limited with respect to its bareboat charters of the VLCCs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Titan Venus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Mayfair
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. We is also seeking recovery of damages for the remaining periods of these charter contracts. The aggregate amount of these claims is approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$2.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. We are unable to predict the outcome of this case at this time.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In 2014, we received
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$17.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in respect of a claim for unpaid charter hire and damages for early termination of the time charter for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Zhejiang
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and recorded this amount as other operating income. We also received
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in this respect and this amount was recorded as time charter revenue as it related to unrecognized time charter revenue in respect of services previously rendered. These amounts were received as full and final settlement in connection with a claim that was lodged jointly with another claimant's claim against the same defendant.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February and April 2014, we received
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively, as final settlements for unpaid charter hire for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Battersea
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and recorded these amounts as other operating income.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Except as described above, to the best of our knowledge, there are no legal or arbitration proceedings existing or pending which have had or may have significant effects on our financial position or profitability and no such proceedings are pending or known to be contemplated.
</FONT>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Bulk China

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

	thirteen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	thirteen

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	31.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;shares.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In March 2015, we acquired
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	twelve
</FONT>

	twelve

	31.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;shares.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	33. SUBSEQUENT EVENTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In January 2016, we took delivery of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Barnet
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Bexley
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Scape
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Swift
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Final installments of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$112.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, in aggregate, were paid and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$117.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was drawn down in debt.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February 2016, we took delivery of, and simultaneously sold (further to a prior agreement), the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Front Caribbean
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and chartered the vessel in for a period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;months. The final installment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$33.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;was paid upon delivery and sales proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$46.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;were received at the same time. There was no related debt.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In January 2016, we prepaid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$4.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, in aggregate, on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;loan facilities in order to comply with year end minimum value covenant requirements. All other agreements were in compliance with this covenant and other covenants at December 31, 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February 2016, we agreed with our lenders to amend certain of the terms on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$420.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;term loan facility,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$425.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;senior secured post-delivery term facility,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$33.93 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;credit facility,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$82.5 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;credit facility and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$284.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;credit facility, or the Loan Facilities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For the period from April 1, 2016 to September 30, 2018 there will be no repayments on these facilities, the minimum value covenant is set at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	100%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;with a subsequent increase to 125% or 135% (depending on the facility) on October 1, 2018 and anytime thereafter and the market adjusted equity ratio is waived. We have also agreed that for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;remaining newbuilding contracts where we have financing in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$425.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;term loan facility, there will be a fixed draw down of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$25.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per vessel subject to compliance with the minimum value covenant of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	100%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the period. The margins on the loans are unchanged and average
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, however, we will pay an increased margin of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for the deferred repayments under the loan facilities. We will resume repayment of each loan on October 1, 2018 based on the repayment model as if October 1, 2018 was April 1, 2016 regardless of any repayment made during the period in accordance with the cash sweep mechanism described below and without affecting the final maturity date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	A cash sweep mechanism will be put in place whereby we will pay down on the deferred repayment amount should our cash position improve. We will furnish our lenders at the end of each first and third quarter a calculation of free projected cash anticipated at September 30, 2018, or the Free Projected Cash. All Free Projected Cash above a threshold of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$25 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;will be used to repay the loans on the cash sweep repayment date, which is when the compliance certificates fall due. The first cash sweep repayment date will fall due at the end of the third quarter of 2016. The cash sweep that we will pay to each lender will be based on a percentage of the excess cash as calculated as per end of that half year period equal to:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the installments that had fallen due and payable under the agreements during that period had not such installments been suspended in accordance; over
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8226;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all regular installments that had fallen due and payable under all existing credit facilities during that period had not such installments been suspended.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Existing credit facilities include the Loan Facilities and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$22 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;senior secured term loan agreement made between Golden Opus Inc, and us as guarantor of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of the facility. Any repayments made under the cash sweep will be applied against balloon payments due on the loans. Due to the operation of the cash sweep mechanism, we will not be permitted to make any cash dividend payments without the prior approval of our lenders in the period to September 30, 2018.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The agreement with the lenders was subject to us raising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$200 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in equity. We announced in February 2016 that we had successfully completed a private placement that raised
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$200 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in equity.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-42
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage137"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The impact of these loan amendments was to defer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$113.9 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;of loan repayments due in the period from April, 1 2016 to September 30, 2018 and to postpone repayments on future drawings on the delivery of newbuilding vessels and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Opus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;in this period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Also in February 2016, we announced a private placement of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	343,684,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;new shares, or the Private Placement Shares, at NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per share, generating gross proceeds of NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.7 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$200 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	), thereby fulfilling the equity condition in our amended financing terms, as described above. Our existing unused authorized share capital was not sufficient to issue all the Private Placement Shares and an increase in our authorized share capital was subsequently approved. The Private Placement Shares are restricted shares in the U.S. and are subject to a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	six
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;month holding period during which they cannot be traded in the U.S. As such, the Private Placement Shares were delivered and registered on a separate ISIN BMG396371145 and listed on the OSE only under a separate trading symbol "GOGL R". The conversion price on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$200 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;convertible bond, or the Convertible Bond, was adjusted in accordance with clause 14.6 of the Bond Agreement from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$19.93
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$17.63
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;per share effective from February 23, 2016 as a result of the private placement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On February 22, 2016, our shareholders approved the increase of our authorized share capital to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$6,000,000.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;divided into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	600,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;common shares of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.01
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;par value each.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February 2016, we announced a subsequent offering, or the Subsequent Offering, of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	34,368,400
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;new common shares for gross proceeds of up to NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	171,842,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;(approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$20 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	). Ultimately,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13,369,291
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;new common shares, or the Subsequent Offering Shares, were issued in connection with the Subsequent Offering for gross proceeds of NOK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	66,846,455
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;(approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$7.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	). As with the Private Placement Shares, the Subsequent Offering Shares issued as part of the Subsequent Offering are restricted shares in the U.S. and were listed on the OSE only under a separate trading symbol "GOGL R", on March 18, 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February 2016, we and the lessor of the chartered-in vessel,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Golden Hawk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, agreed that the daily rate be reduced to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$11,200
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$13,200
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;from February 20, 2016. We also agreed that we will reimburse the lessor when the reduced daily rate exceeds the 6-T/C Baltic Exchange Supramax Index in any day during the two year period with the maximum reimbursed amount capped at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.75 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and that on February 20, 2022 we will pay to the lessor the difference between the amount reimbursed and $1.75 million.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In February 2016, Golden Union Shipping Co S.A. equally transferred its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	20%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;stake in Capesize Chartering to the remaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;joint venture partners (Bocimar International NV, C Transport Holding Ltd, Star Bulk Carrier Corp and the Company). Capesize Chartering was established in 2015 to provide chartering services in respect of the Capesize tonnage for all of the initial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;dry bulk shipowning groups.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In March 2016, we agreed a delay in the delivery of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;Capesize vessels from the original delivery dates in February and March 2016 to the end of October 2016.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-43
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	50%
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Seateam Management Pte Ltd
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Singapore
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;PADDING-LEFT:2PX;PADDING-TOP:2PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:2PX;PADDING-RIGHT:2PX;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	21.25%
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 12.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION OF THE PRINCIPAL EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14(a) AND 15d-14(a), AS AMENDED
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;I, Herman Billung, certify that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 20-F of Golden Ocean Group Limited;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The company's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the company and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the company's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
